days.text: Humid. Cloudy. Mist. Showers. Possible thunderstorms at first. Force 3 to 4 east to southeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Mainly cloudy. Mist. A few rain patches. Force 3 to 4 south to southeasterly winds.
Humid. Cloudy. Mist. Occasional showers. Possible thunderstorms later. Force 2 to 3 southerly winds with gusts.
Temperature falling. Mainly cloudy. A few rain patches at first. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Mainly cloudy. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
